lines.content: ; refresh agendapoints to 1 before shuffle in case it was modified by e.g. The Board
:prompt "Select a piece of ICE from the Temporary Zone to install"
(continue-ability state side (abt (inc n) i) card nil)
{:prompt "None of the cards are ice. Say goodbye!"
:optional {:prompt "Look at the top 3 cards of R&D?"
:msg "look at the top 3 cards of R&D"
:prompt "Use Advanced Concept Hopper to draw 1 card or gain 1 [Credits]?"
(system-msg state :corp (str "uses Advanced Concept Hopper to gain 1 [Credits]")))
(system-msg state :corp (str "uses Advanced Concept Hopper to draw 1 card")))
:msg "give the Runner a tag for trashing a Corp card"
:msg "look at the top 5 cards of R&D"
:effect (req (let [decline-msg "does not install any of the top 5 cards"]
:prompt (str "Select a server to install " (:title chosen-ice) " on")
:effect (effect (show-wait-prompt :corp "Runner to suffer 5 meat damage or take 2 tags")
(system-msg state :runner "chooses to suffer 5 meat damage from Armed Intimidation"))
(system-msg state :runner "chooses to take 2 tags from Armed Intimidation"))))}
{:implementation "Runner must trash cards manually when required"
:msg "make the Runner trash a card from their grip to jack out or break subroutines for the remainder of the run"}]}
:effect (effect (show-wait-prompt :runner "Corp to place advancement tokens with Award Bait")
:msg (msg "place " c " advancement tokens on " (card-str state target))
:prompt "Select a card to move to HQ"
(system-msg state :corp (str "uses Bacterial Programming to add " (count to-hq)
", and arrange the top cards of R&D")))
:msg (str "give the Runner a tag for " kind)
:optional {:prompt "Trigger the ability of a scored agenda?"
:yes-ability {:prompt "Select an agenda to trigger the \"when scored\" ability of"
{:prompt "Pay credits to add random cards from Runner's Grip to the bottom of their Stack?"
(system-msg state side (str "uses Brain Rewiring to pay " target
" to the bottom of their Stack."
(system-msg state :corp "used Broad Daylight to take 1 bad publicity")
(system-msg state side (str "gains " bucks " [Credits] from CFC Excavation Contract"))))}
{:msg "remove all cards in the Runner's Heap from the game"
:stolen {:msg "force the Corp to take 1 bad publicity"
(system-msg state :corp (str "uses Corporate Sales Team to gain 1 [Credits]"))
(do (show-wait-prompt state :runner "Corp to select cards in HQ to be accessed")
{:prompt (msg "Select " (access-count state side :hq-access) " cards in HQ for the Runner to access")
; access-helper-hq uses a set to keep track of which cards have already
; been accessed. Using the set difference we make the runner unable to
; access non-selected cards from the corp prompt
"create a new remote server, installing cards from HQ or Archives, ignoring all install costs"))})]
{:optional {:prompt "Install cards in a new remote server?"
prompt (str "Forfeit Divested Trust to add " title
message (str "add " title " to HQ and gain 5 [Credits]")]
:msg (msg "ignore the install cost of the first ICE this turn")}}}
(toast state :corp "Cannot advance cards this turn due to Efficiency Committee." "warning")))))
:abilities [{:label "Host a card from HQ on Glenn Station"
:prompt "Choose a card to host on Glenn Station"
{:label "Add a card on Glenn Station to HQ"
(letfn [(graft [n] {:prompt "Choose a card to add to HQ with Graft"
:msg "add up to 3 cards from R&D to HQ"
:abilities [{:prompt "Select a card to add to the bottom of R&D"
(system-msg state side (str "uses Hyperloop Extension to gain 3 [Credits]")))]
(system-msg state side (str "gains " n " [Credits] from Illicit Sales"))
:prompt "Select a card to place 2 advancement tokens on"
:prompt "Select an asset or upgrade to install from Archives or HQ"
:msg (msg "install and rez " (:title target) ", ignoring all costs")
(letfn [(msr [] {:prompt "Select two pieces of ICE to swap positions"
(system-msg state side "uses Meteor Mining to gain 7 [Credits]")
(system-msg state side "uses Meteor Mining do 7 meat damage"))
(do (system-msg state side "does not use Meteor Mining")
(system-msg state :corp (str "uses Net Quarantine to gain " extra "[Credits]")))))}]
:effect (req (system-msg state :corp "uses Net Quarantine to reduce Runner's base link to zero")
:prompt "Install a card from HQ in a new remote?"
" and rez it, ignoring all costs"))
:msg (msg "force the Runner to trash " (:title (last (:discard runner))) " from their Grip at random")}]
{:optional {:prompt "Forfeit Posted Bounty to give the Runner 1 tag and take 1 bad publicity?"
:yes-ability {:msg "give the Runner 1 tag and take 1 bad publicity"
:msg (msg "take " target " bad publicity and gain " (* 5 (str->int target)) " [Credits]")
:msg (msg "force the Runner to trash " (trash-count-str card) " and take 1 bad publicity")
:label "Search R&D and add 1 card to HQ"
;; we need the req or the prompt will still show
:msg "make a piece of ICE gain \"[Subroutine] Do 1 net damage\" after all its other subroutines for the remainder of the run"}]}
:prompt "Choose a card in Archives to add to HQ"
:msg (str "make the approached piece of Bioroid ICE gain \"[Subroutine] End the run\""
"after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run")}]}
{:prompt (str "Select a card in HQ to swap with " (:title to-swap))
:msg (msg "swap " (card-str state to-swap) " with a card from HQ")
{:prompt "Choose a card in or protecting the attacked server."
{:prompt "Select a card to place 1 advancement token on"
{:prompt "Quantum Predictive Model was added to the corp's score area"
:msg "add it to their score area and gain 1 agenda point"}}
(drop 1) ;so that all actual ads remain ads if agenda leaves play
{:prompt (str "The bottom cards of R&D will be " (clojure.string/join  ", " (map :title chosen)) ".")
(str "add " n " cards from HQ to the bottom of R&D and draw " n " cards."
" The Runner randomly adds " (if (<= n (count (:hand runner))) n 0)
" cards from their Grip to the bottom of the Stack")))
; if corp chooses more cards than runner's hand, don't shuffle runner hand back into Stack
(continue-ability state side (corp-choice original '() original) card nil))))})
(corp-choice [remaining chosen original] ; Corp chooses cards until they press 'Done'
{:prompt "Choose a card to move to bottom of R&D"
(continue-ability state side (corp-final (remove #(= % "Done") chosen) original) card nil)
(do (system-msg state side "does not add any cards from HQ to bottom of R&D")
:effect (req (show-wait-prompt state :runner "Corp to add cards from HQ to bottom of R&D")
(do (system-msg state side "does not add any cards from HQ to bottom of R&D")
:optional {:prompt "Search R&D for a piece of ice to install protecting a remote server?"
:prompt (str "Select a server to install " (:title chosen-ice) " on")
{:prompt "Select another installed copy of Research Grant to score"
:msg "score another installed copy of Research Grant"}
:effect (req (show-wait-prompt state :runner "Corp to use SDS Drone Deployment")
:msg "decrease the Runner's maximum hand size by 1"
:swapped {:msg "decrease the Runner's maximum hand size by 1"
:prompt "Choose a bioroid to rez, ignoring all costs"
:prompt "Choose one of your installed cards to trash due to Standoff"
(system-msg state :runner "declines to trash a card due to Standoff")
(system-msg state :corp "draws a card and gains 5 [Credits] from Standoff")
(do (system-msg state :corp "declines to trash a card from Standoff")
(system-msg state side (str "trashes " (card-str state target) " due to Standoff"))
(show-wait-prompt state side (str (side-str (other-side side)) " to trash a card for Standoff"))
:effect (effect (show-wait-prompt (str (side-str (other-side side)) " to trash a card for Standoff"))
(letfn [(sft [n max] {:prompt "Select a card in HQ to install with Successful Field Test"
(continue-ability state side (sft (inc n) max) card nil)
:msg "install cards from HQ, ignoring all costs"
:prompt "Choose a card to add to HQ"
:msg (msg "add a card from R&D to HQ and shuffle R&D")
:label "Install a piece of ice in any position, ignoring all costs"
:prompt "Select a piece of ice to install"
{:prompt "Which position to install in? (0 is innermost)"
"trash from the Runner's stack but it is empty"))
:implementation "Prevention of subroutine breaking is not enforced"
:prompt "Choose an ICE type for Unorthodox Predictions"
:msg (msg "prevent subroutines on " target " ICE from being broken until next turn.")}
(let [dmg {:msg "do 1 net damage for each card in the grip"
:prompt "Use Voting Machine Initiative to make the Runner lose 1 [Click]?"
((constantly false) (toast state :corp "Cannot score Vulnerability Audit the turn it was installed." "warning"))
:stolen {:msg "force the Corp to take 1 bad publicity"
"Set each side's agenda points target at 6, per draft format rules"
"Checks if the faction has a plurality of rezzed / installed cards"
;; Count is not more, do not change the accumulator map
(toast state :corp "Cannot afford to pay 1 credit to block card exposure" "info")
{:prompt "Pay 1 [Credits] to prevent exposure of installed card?"
{:implementation "Additional tag is gained on approach, not on encounter"
;; Should be comprehensive list of all cases when tag should be gained or lost
;; Add directives to :play-area - assumed to be empty
"AgInfusion: New Miracles for a New World"
:prompt "Choose another server and redirect the run to its outermost position"
:msg (msg "trash the approached ICE. The Runner is now running on " target)
{:prompt "Choose a card in HQ to discard"
:msg "force the Corp to trash 1 card from HQ"
:msg "make the Runner take 1 tag or suffer 2 meat damage"
(do (system-msg state side "chooses to suffer 2 meat damage")
" in HQ to install with Asa Group: Security Through Vigilance (optional)")
{:abilities [{:label "[:click] Add 1 card from NVRAM to your grip"
:msg "move a card from NVRAM to their Grip"
:effect (req (show-wait-prompt state :corp "the Runner to choose cards for NVRAM")
(host state side (get-card state card) c {:facedown true}))
(system-msg (str "uses Azmari EdTech: Shaping the Future to name " target)))}
;; Effect marks Az's ability as "used" if it has already met it's trigger condition this turn
:msg (msg "reduce the install cost of " (:title target) " by 1 [Credits]")
(system-msg state side (str "adds " (:title target) " to HQ and gains " cost " [Credits]"))
(damage state side eid :net (get-defer-damage state side :net nil)
(do (show-wait-prompt state :runner "Corp to use Chronos Protocol: Selective Mind-mapping")
{:prompt (str "Use Chronos Protocol: Selective Mind-mapping to reveal the Runner's "
"Grip to select the first card trashed?")
(show-wait-prompt state :corp "Runner to use Freedom Khumalo's ability")
:prompt "Select a piece of ICE to place 1 advancement token on"
(toast state :runner "Cannot steal due to Haarpsichord Studios." "warning"))
:effect (effect (show-wait-prompt :runner "Corp to use Haas-Bioroid: Architects of Tomorrow")
;; Triggered when gaining or losing additional tag
{:prompt (msg "Select another " type " to install from your Grip")
:label "Reveal the top card of the Stack"
(system-msg state side (str "uses Hyoubu Institute: Absolute Clarity to reveal " (:title revealed-card)))
:label "Reveal a random card from the Grip"
(system-msg state side (str "uses Hyoubu Institute: Absolute Clarity to reveal " (:title revealed-card)))
"Information Dynamics: All You Need To Know"
{:prompt "Select a card to place advancement tokens on with Jemison Astronautics: Sacrifice. Audacity. Success."
:msg (msg "place " p " advancement tokens on " (card-str state target))
:msg "avoid the first tag during this run"
:prompt "Choose a copy of Jinteki Biotech to use this game"
(system-msg (str "has chosen a copy of Jinteki Biotech for this game")))}}
(toast state :corp "Flip to: The Brewery (Do 2 net damage)" "info")
(toast state :corp "Flip to: The Tank (Shuffle Archives into R&D)" "info")
(toast state :corp "Flip to: The Greenhouse (Place 4 advancement tokens on a card)" "info")))}
(do (system-msg state side "uses The Brewery to do 2 net damage")
(do (system-msg state side "uses The Tank to shuffle Archives into R&D")
(do (system-msg state side (str "uses The Greenhouse to place 4 advancement tokens "
"on a card that can be advanced"))
{:prompt "Select a card that can be advanced"
(system-msg state :corp (str "uses Jinteki: Potential Unleashed to trash " (:title c)
" from the top of the Runner's Stack"))
{:abilities [{:label "Install a non-virus program from your stack, lowering the cost by 1 [Credit]"
:msg (msg "install " (:title target) " from their stack, lowering the cost by 1 [Credit]")
;; Effect marks Kate's ability as "used" if it has already met it's trigger condition this turn
:msg (msg "reduce the install cost of " (:title target) " by 1 [Credits]")
{:prompt "Select an icebreaker to install from your Grip"
:prompt "Force the Corp to draw a card?"
:no-ability {:effect (effect (system-msg "declines to use Laramy Fisk: Savvy Investor"))}}}
:prompt "Select an unrezzed card to return to HQ"
(str "trash " (join ", " (map :title (take 2 deck))) " from their Stack and draw 1 card")
"trash the top 2 cards from their Stack and draw 1 card - but their Stack is empty")))
:label "Install a piece of ice from HQ at the innermost position"
:msg "install ice at the innermost position of this server. Runner is now approaching that ice"
:effect (req (toast state :corp "You may use Mti Mwekundu: Life Improved to install ice from HQ." "info"))}}})
;; check that the rezzed item is the encountered ice
:effect (req (toast state :runner "Click Nasir Meidan: Cyber Explorer to lose all credits and gain credits equal to the rez cost of the newly rezzed ice." "info"))}}
(system-msg state side (str "loses all credits and gains " cost
:effect (req (show-wait-prompt state :runner "Corp to use NBN: Controlling the Message")
{:prompt "Trace the Runner with NBN: Controlling the Message?"
:yes-ability {:prompt "Select a Current to play from HQ or Archives"
(let [ndhelper (fn nd [n] {:prompt (msg "When finished, click NEXT Design: Guarding the Net to draw back up to 5 cards in HQ. "
"Select a piece of ICE in HQ to install:")
:msg "install up to 3 pieces of ICE and draw back up to 5 cards"
{:events {:runner-install {:msg "force the Corp to trash the top card of R&D"
:prompt "Select a card in your Grip to trash"
:msg (msg "trash " (:title target) " and reduce the strength of " (:title current-ice)
" by 2 for the remainder of the run")
:prompt "Treat as a successful run on which server?"
; remove the :req from the run-effect, so that other cards that replace
(system-msg state side (str "uses Omar Keung: Conspiracy Theorist to make a successful run on " target))))}
:msg (msg "make " (:title current-ice) " gain Code Gate until the end of the run")
(update! state side (assoc ice :subtype (combine-subtypes true stypes "Code Gate")))
((constantly false) (toast state :corp "Cannot rez due to Saraswati Mnemonics: Endless Exploration." "warning"))
((constantly false) (toast state :corp "Cannot score due to Saraswati Mnemonics: Endless Exploration." "warning"))
:prompt "Select a card to install from HQ"
:msg (msg "install a card in a remote server and place 1 advancement token on it")
:prompt "Select a card to add to the top of R&D"
:msg (msg "add " (if (:seen target) (:title target) "a card") " to the top of R&D")}]}
{:implementation "Manually triggered, no restriction on which cards in Heap can be targeted.  Cannot use on in progress run event"
:abilities [{:label "Remove a card in the Heap that was just trashed from the game"
(show-wait-prompt state :runner "Corp to use Skorpios' ability" {:card card})
{:prompt "Choose a card in the Runner's Heap that was just trashed"
;; do not allow a run event in progress to get nuked #2963
:msg (msg "make the Runner lose 1 [Credits] by rezzing an Advertisement")}}}
:effect (req (show-wait-prompt state :runner "Corp to use SSO Industries' ability")
{:prompt (str "Select ICE with no advancement tokens to place "
" on ICE with no advancement tokens")
(show-wait-prompt state :runner "Corp to choose which card to remove from the game")
{:prompt "Choose which card to remove from the game"
" to add " (:title c2) " to their Grip."
" Corp removes " (:title c1) " from the game")))
" to add " (:title c1) " to their Grip."
" Corp removes " (:title c2) " from the game"))))
:prompt "Select a card in Archives to shuffle into R&D"
:abilities [{:prompt "Select two pieces of ICE to swap positions"
{:rez {:req (req (and (ice? target) ;; Did you rez and ice just now
(system-msg state side (str "uses The Foundry to add a copy of "
(:title found-card) " to HQ, and shuffles their deck"))
(do (system-msg state side (str "fails to find a target for The Foundry, and shuffles their deck"))
:prompt "Do a meat damage from identity ability?"
(system-msg state side "uses Weyland Consortium: Builder of Nations to do 1 meat damage")))}]}
;; 15 Minutes - check if it works correctly from both sides
;; use 15 minutes to take it away from runner
(testing "Corp draws 1 card, only once per turn"
(is (= cards (count (:hand (get-corp)))) (str "Corp should have " cards " cards in hand"))
(is (= (inc cards) (count (:hand (get-corp)))) (str "Corp should have " (inc cards) " card in hand"))
(is (empty (:prompt (get-corp))) "No prompt as it's once per turn")))
(testing "Corp gains 1 credit, only once per turn"
(is (empty (:prompt (get-corp))) "No prompt as it's once per turn")))))
(is (= grip (count (:hand (get-runner)))) (str "Runner has " grip " cards in hand"))
(testing "don't take a tag from trashing normally"
(testing "don't gain a tag from second trash"
(is (:rezzed (get-ice state :remote2 0)) "Enigma was installed and rezzed, both at no cost")
(is (empty (:prompt (get-corp))) "No more prompts if cancel is clicked")
(is (:rezzed (get-ice state :remote2 1)) "Enigma 2 was installed and rezzed, both at no cost")
(is (empty (:prompt (get-corp))) "No prompts if there is no ice")))
(is (= 2 (count-tags state)) "Runner took 2 tags from Armed Intimidation tag choice")
(is (= 5 (count (:hand (get-runner)))) "Runner has 5 cards before Armed Intimidation meat damage")
(is (zero? (count (:hand (get-runner)))) "Runner has 0 cards after Armed Intimidation meat damage")))
(is (last-log-contains? state "make the Runner trash") "Should only write to log"))))
(str (:title from)" token was not used on " (:title to) msg))
(str "Advancement token not placed on " (:title to) msg)))
(str (:title from) " token was used on " (:title to) msg))
(is (zero? (get-counters (refresh iw) :advancement)) "Ice Wall should start with 0 advancement tokens")
(is (= 2 (get-counters (refresh iw) :advancement)) "Ice Wall should gain 2 advancement tokens")
(is (= 4 (get-counters (refresh iw) :advancement)) "Ice Wall should gain 2 advancement tokens"))))
(testing "Scoring should not cause a run to exist for runner."
(testing "Removing all cards from R&D should not freeze for runner, nor give an extra access."
;; Get the first card listed in the prompt choice
(click-prompt state :corp "Done")                          ; Finished with move-to-hq (no cards to move)
;; Run and prompts should be over now
(is (= 1 (count-tags state)) "Runner takes 1 tag for playing a Run event")
(is (empty? (:prompt (get-corp))) "Corp shouldn't get a prompt to use Better Citizen Program")
(is (= 1 (count-tags state)) "Runner doesn't gain a tag from installing an icebreaker after playing a Run event")
(is (= 2 (count-tags state)) "Runner gains 1 tag for installing an Icebreaker")
(is (empty? (:prompt (get-corp))) "Corp shouldn't get a prompt to use Better Citizen Program")
(is (= 2 (count-tags state)) "Runner doesn't gain a tag from playing a Run event after installing an Icebreaker")
(is (empty? (:prompt (get-corp))) "Corp shouldn't get a prompt to use Better Citizen Program")
(is (zero? (count-tags state)) "Runner should not gain a tag from playing a non-Run event"))))
(is (not (empty? (:prompt (get-runner)))) "Runner waiting for Corp resolve Brain Rewiring")
(is (empty? (:prompt (get-runner))) "Runner not waiting for Corp resolve Brain Rewiring")
(is (= 2 (count-tags state)) "Runner receives 2 tags from Breaking News")
(is (zero? (count-tags state))) "Two tags removed at the end of the turn"))
(click-prompt state :corp "0")  ;; Corp doesn't pump trace, base 3
(click-prompt state :runner "0")  ;; Runner doesn't pump trace; loses trace
(click-prompt state :corp "0")  ;; Corp doesn't pump trace, base 3
(click-prompt state :runner "5")  ;; Runner pumps trace; wins trace
(str "Should now have with " (+ credit (* 2 n)) " credits"))))))
(is (= 2 (-> (get-corp) :selected first :max)) "Corp chooses 2 cards for Runner to access")))
(is (zero? (:agenda-point (get-runner))) "Runner stole Degree Mill with no installed cards")
(click-prompt state :runner "Pay shuffling 2 installed cards into the stack to steal")
(is (= 2 (count (:deck (get-runner)))) "Degree Mill didn't put cards back in deck"))
;; Checking if facedowns work as well
(is (= 3 (:agenda-point (get-runner))) "Runner stole Degree Mill with single card")
(is (= 2 (count (get-in (get-runner) [:rig :facedown]))) "Hunting Ground did not install cards facedown")
(is (empty? (:deck (get-runner))) "Hunting Grounds did not remove cards from deck")
(click-prompt state :runner "Pay shuffling 2 installed cards into the stack to steal")
(is (= 6 (:agenda-point (get-runner))) "Runner failed to steal Degree Mill with facedown cards")
(is (= 2 (count (:deck (get-runner)))) "Degree Mill didn't put cards back in deck")))))
(click-prompt state :runner "shuffling 2 installed cards into the stack")
(is (-> (get-corp) :hand count zero?) "Corp has no cards in hand")
(is (= 1 (:agenda-point (get-corp))) "Corp should agenda points from Divested Trust")
(is (= 1 (:agenda-point (get-runner))) "Runner should gain agenda points for stealing Hostile Takeover")
(is (= "Hostile Takeover" (-> (get-corp) :hand first :title)) "Hostile Takeover should be in HQ")
(is (zero? (:agenda-point (get-corp))) "Corp should lose points from forfeit agenda")
(is (zero? (:agenda-point (get-runner))) "Runner should lose agenda points from agenda leaving score area")))
(testing "Doesn't stop the runner from winning. Issue #4107"
(is (empty? (:prompt (get-corp))) "Corp doesn't get opportunity to use Divested Trust")
(is (= 1 (:agenda-point (get-corp))) "Should provide 1 agenda point after ability use"))))
;; Test that Eden Fragment ignores the install cost of the first ice
(is (some? (get-ice state :hq 1)) "Corp has two ice installed on HQ")
(is (= 6 (:credit (get-corp))) "Corp does not pay for installing the first ICE of the turn")
(is (some? (get-ice state :hq 2)) "Corp has three ice installed on HQ")
(is (= 4 (:credit (get-corp))) "Corp pays for installing the second ICE of the turn")))
(is (= 4 (:current-strength (refresh lf))) "Should start with base strength of 4")
(is (= 1 (:credit (get-corp))) "Should gain 1 credit for rezzed code gate"))))
(is (= 2 (count (:hand (get-corp)))) "Corp should start with 1 card in HQ")
(is (zero? (count (:hand (get-corp)))) "Corp should have 0 cards in HQ after shuffling HQ back into R&D")
(is (zero? (get-counters (refresh er-scored) :agenda)) "Executive Retreat should have 0 agenda counters")))
(is (= 2 (count (:hand (get-corp)))) "Corp should start with 1 card in HQ")
(is (zero? (count (:hand (get-corp)))) "Corp should have 0 cards in HQ after shuffling HQ back into R&D")
(is (zero? (get-counters (refresh er-scored) :agenda)) "Executive Retreat should have 0 agenda counters")
(is (= 2 (:click (get-runner))) "Runner should lose 2 clicks from False Lead")))
(is (= 3 (count (:hand (get-runner)))) "Runner took 2 net damage from Fetal AI")
(is (= 3 (count (:hand (get-runner)))) "Runner took 2 net damage from Fetal AI")
(is (= 3 (get-counters (refresh fu) :agenda)) "Firmware Updates should start with 3 agenda counters")
(is (zero? (get-counters (refresh iw) :advancement)) "Ice Wall should start with 0 advancement tokens")
(is (= 2 (get-counters (refresh fu) :agenda)) "Firmware Updates should now have 2 agenda counters")
(is (= 1 (get-counters (refresh iw) :advancement)) "Ice Wall should have 1 advancement token"))))
;; Fly on the Wall - give the runner 1 tag
(is (zero? (get-counters (refresh btscored) :agenda)) "No agenda counters on scored Braintrust")
"No agenda counters on installed Braintrust; not a valid target")
"1 agenda counter placed on scored Braintrust")))))
(testing "prevented bad publicity shouldn't block credit gain"
(is (= 1 (count (:hand (get-corp)))) "Corp should have no opportunity to use Hades Shard")
(is (= 2 (count (:deck (get-corp)))) "R&D should have 2 cards in it after Hades Fragment use"))))
(is (zero? (get-counters (refresh cs) :power)) "Chief Slee should start with 0 power counters")
(is (= 1 (get-counters (refresh cs) :power)) "Chief Slee should gain 1 power counter")
(is (= 3 (get-counters (refresh cs) :power)) "Chief Slee should gain 2 power counters from 1 to 3"))))
(is (zero? (get-counters (refresh hr) :advancement)) "Hollywood Renovation should start with 0 advancement tokens")
(is (zero? (get-counters (refresh iw) :advancement)) "Ice Wall should start with 0 advancement tokens")
(is (= 5 (get-counters (refresh hr) :advancement)) "Hollywood Renovation should gain 5 advancement tokens")
(is (= 5 (get-counters (refresh iw) :advancement)) "Ice Wall should gain 5 advancement tokens")
(is (= 6 (get-counters (refresh hr) :advancement)) "Hollywood Renovation should gain 1 from 5 to 6 advancement tokens")
(is (= 7 (get-counters (refresh iw) :advancement)) "Ice Wall should gain 2 from 5 to 7 advancement tokens"))))
(is (= 3 (get-counters (refresh hok-scored) :agenda)) "House of Knives should start with 3 counters")
(is (zero? (:credit (get-runner))) "Runner couldn't afford to steal, so no credits spent")
(is (zero? (:click (get-runner))) "Runner couldn't afford to steal, so no clicks spent")
;; do not reveal when the Runner does not steal from R&D
(is (not (last-log-contains? state "Ikawah Project")) "Ikawah Project should not be mentioned")
(is (last-log-contains? state "Ikawah Project") "Ikawah Project should be mentioned"))))
(testing (str "starting with " starting-bp " and answering " answer " and gaining " credits-gained)
(is (= 9 (:credit (get-runner))) "Runner should gain 4 credits from Corp scoring")
(is (= 13 (:credit (get-runner))) "Runner should gain 4 credits from Corp scoring")))
(is (= 4 (:current-strength (refresh nh))) "Should start with base strength of 4")
"Should gain only 1 bonus trace strength regardless of number of runs in a turn")
(is (zero? (-> (get-corp) :prompt first :bonus)) "Should gain 0 bonus trace strength, as it's an encounter ability"))))
(is (zero? (get-counters (refresh pa) :advancement)) "Project Atlas starts with no counters")
